entry.title: Premium Black Compression Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - Bundles
Price: 85.00 - 167.95 (25 variants)

* You can leave a note at the cart page with your preferred choice of shorts design. You can also request different size for each item.

Look and feel your best with the Premium Black Compression Bundle. The full bundle includes the Premium Black Rash Guard in long sleeve and short sleeve, BJJ Spats and your choice of BJJ/MMA shorts.

The sleek and classic design of the Premium Black Rash Guard makes it great for any belt rank and it’s minimalist design makes it the perfect workout compression shirt for men. Black absorbs light just like a fighter will absorb techniques in these durable compression pants and MMA shorts. This bundle is perfect for jiu-jitsu, MMA and as workout gear for men.

WHY PREMIUM?

PREMIUM BLACK COMPRESSION BUNDLE is durable and stylish, can wear alongside with other gear designs you like. Made with quality material mixture design to last. Multi-panel stitching for extra strength and gel-panel technology for more comfort.

MATERIAL: Durable mixture of Polyester and Spandex. This makes this highly strong, durable, flexible, stretchable, non-shrinkable and lightweight to give its maximum comfort. Specially made for intense MMA grappling and Jiu-Jitsu training.

DESIGN: The main aim of this gear is to increase competitiveness by helping support muscular distress and decreasing the recovery process, so you can get back to your full strength again. It also has a unique and smart compression technology to enhance blood circulation.

STITCHING: It gives the support in high impact zones and the flexibility where you need it to move freely. Multi-panel construction, high-density flat-lock stitching for optimal fit and durability.

GRAPHICS: This rash guard has a black premium color. Black is a very strong powerful color that demands seriousness and respect. It can be an intimidating color which also suggests discipline.
